评论详情: I’ve been buying the athleta fleece lined boot cut leggings but they are always sold out of my size. Decided to try these. These are better!!!! Fit , comfort, warmth beats out athleta in all these areas! Probably durability too as my athleta ones are all pilled . I’m so thrilled with these!!! Highly recommend !!!!!

I'm 5'7 141 lbs. The Large were skin tight and felt a bit short. I sent back . The XL fits and is comfortable although today the left side of the tie came undone from the inside seam. I like the fabric and feel . Sizing runs small as I usually wear Chicos 5 or 1
AMAZING!! Must buy!!! They are so flattering and comfy. The pockets are so convenient too. 10/10.

I really like the feel and fit of these. I want to love them but can't. I find them a bit short. If they came in a Tall/Long version I'd be all over it! I ordered the large and am more leg than body. I struggle all the time to find pants and such long enough. Hopefully Baleaf can pull through with more options in the future. I really do like the brand and have a bunch of the fleece lined tights/leggings.
Not fleece lined as the description stated!
Didn't fit. Not for tallpeople

Not sure if they were mismarked for sizing, or this pant runs super small. I ordered these in a size up from my normal size, thinking if they were a little large I’d pass them on to my daughter. I couldn’t even pull them up all the way they were so tight.

评论概述: Just purchased 2nd pair of these leggings!
评论详情: These leggings are warm, yet not suffocating.  I am 5’7 size 10-12.  I ordered a size L, and ended up ordering a second pair in XL…which were still skin tight yet more comfortable.  I do think they run small.  This color was listed as navy blue.  I would call it deep/ocean blue at best.  Definitely NOT navy, so just be aware of that.  Good quality & no pilling when washed.
Warm, stylish, good quality material! Highly recommend!
These feel great and are really warm.
Thinner than expected. Comfortable and good fit. Good for the price.

I needed something soft, yet durable for my c-section scar.  The high waist keeps all the bloat in without discomfort! They are warm but not sweat creating on a fall texas day! Best value for money, I'll be getting more!
I love these yoga pants fits so good. You don’t have to worry about pulling or tugging on the all day.
My coworker bought a pair of these said they were super warm .I found them to be comfortable I got 3x but not as warm as she does

These feel tight.  Maybe because they are lined.  I sized up but they still feel restrictive.  Not a fan of the super wide legs especially since these are lined and designed for winter use.  Wearing boots and wanting to put the legs INSIDE my boots to keep the bottom dry was difficult.  If you don't plan on wearing boots then you might like these.  I would now say I prefer a boot cut legging over this wide bottom.

I bought one pair to check them out, cuz you never know the quality that you’ll get until it arrives, and I LOVED these so much I bought 4 more!! Great fit, fabric is great! It feels buttery smooth. Comfortable compression fit, not super tight. It’s just right. Makes my butt look good! I have this saved as my favorite if I ever need to order more.
Warm for walking.  Wash up and dry nicely.

These feel awesome. I'm almost five eight and they are plenty long enough after washing and drying. They are soooo soft, I purchased 3 more pair. We're off to Vegas and they actually look dressy with the right top. Who knew? I'm hour glass curvy - and they work!  btw, I don't know if they're warm or not, but I don't care. Buying them for the fit.
These are soft and very comfortable, I just wish they had them a little longer length.
Warm layer for my outdoor job!
I loved these they are think fleece lined and flattering and fit perfectly but when I would pull them up throughout the day two holes appeared instantly on the side seams. :(

I have been wanting to try this brand, so when we were hit with cooler than normal weather, I got these to wear while hiking.  I wore them on a 4 mile hike at 20 degrees.  They were better than regular yoga pants, but still cold.  I have warmer ones that feel pretty much like the same fleece and fabric.

These fleece lined pants are so warm without being bulky. They look a lot nicer than regular leggings on my short senior frame. Love all the pockets, too. The only thing I dislike is the tie in the front that seems to be sewn in at the sides. But it’s thin enough to just tuck into the pants. I liked them so much that I bought a second pair in blue.

评论概述: fits like a glove, soft as a mitten
评论详情: Hard to find pants that fit curvy bums. I can always depend on baleaf

I bought these pair sweater pants because of recommendations from social media. However, the material doesn’t aligned with the description on the website neither warm at all. After one time wash before I even wear them, the stitches become frizzy, especially at the crotch area and it really awkward when you put them on. Returned them already.
These pants are warm, soft, and fit well. The length is good and they didn’t shrink after I washed them
These pants are so comfortable and warm. They fit good. I will buy these again.
I purchased these as a gift for my daughter. She wore them the first day she got them. She said they are a perfect fit, comfortable, soft and warm. And well made.
Runs small.  I usually take a large or xl...the xl is like a medium.
Fleece lined. Warm and great fit
I love them 😁 perfect for very comfortable, worth every penny 😍

I love these so much I bought a two more. Warm enough to wear in a Midwest winter to run a quick errand. I love these side pockets. I am only 5’4” so I had to order the short version but gave the regular link to my daughter. Pants are cute enough to wear at work and dress up nice with a sweater or even my work polo. Really like I was able to order a M although I can probably wear a L as well. I think they are extremely flattering for my curves.

So I bought these and another pair for my 17yr old daughter so she could wear to walk her dog in the cold.  I can't put what she said, but suffice it to say it's like Goldilocks in the story...they fit "just right." And are warm. She loves them.
I am in love with these leggings! I will definitely be buying more! ❤️

评论概述: If you’re tall be wary of length!
评论详情: At 5’ 4” tall most flare leggings drag on the ground but that is NOT the case with these. If you’re much taller they may be floods. Otherwise they are warm without being bulky.
Warm and comfortable
Great fit, soft and warm

I love these pants, I ended up buying multiple colors. Usually when I buy flared leggings, they’re too long for me but these are absolutely perfect. I wish they were a little thicker but they are very soft and comfortable

I do think these are warmer than my other baleaf yoga pants.  They are very soft and comfortable,  but I'm an XL, which is what I got, but they are much snarled than pants that come from the same company.  They are tighter (i got the flare style) until probably mid calf and then they are short on me.  I just wish they were a big wider on the way down the leg.  Unlike other yoga pants they have a draw string and a loose waist band. It isn't a problem since they are already snug on me, but an XXL would probably have to be tied for me to not sag.

This brand is my one stop shop for leggings. I have them in multiple colors/varieties because they’re FANTASTIC. Truly the best I’ve ever owned. I’m a mom of 3 & need leggings that can hold up & fit comfortably. These easily meet the mark. Buy em.
Great fit, very comfortable and warm! The pockets are good size and the material is very good quality. Great value for the price.
Great quality, sizing is accurate, comfy

评论概述: I've never been one for athle-leisure
评论详情: But these pants may change my mind.  So cute and comfortable and no one could really tell they are in essence yoga pants.  Now if it would just get cold so I could appreciate how warm they keep my legs.
I ordered a 3x but sadly they fit like a 1x. No bigger size to order so had to return, Would have been nice if they fit because material was nice.
Love them, they look so good while keeping me warm! Super soft and comfy! Definitely getting more colors

评论概述: Didn’t expect them to be so tight.
评论详情: See above
Nice pants and not too much flare. Legs are not long enough.
They could come in pettie would nice or short

They looked nice but the drawstring isn't a full string and broke immediately. It's my size but large at the waist in particular so I pretty much needed the string for them to fit perfectly. Wouldn't buy again.

评论概述: Do not run true to size.
评论详情: Run small.
Very comfortable and warm.  Will buy again.

Love these fleece lined pants. The size was perfect hugs all in the right places. No.lumps or bumps. It makes your behind look very shapely. The material is of good quality it is nice and stretchy keeps you warm on chilly days because of the thickness of the material.

评论概述: Cute but not durable at all
评论详情: They are cute and look nice on but I only got to wear them once before I got a hole in one of the top seams while wearing them, not even with washing so I’m even more worried how they would hold up in the wash. I’m outside of my return window so I guess I’m just stuck with them and will have to get the seam fixed somewhere. They are warm, which is why I bought them for a cold climate trip.
pide una talla menos
They are comfortable, soft and very warm. Material stretches nice, thick for winter wear, bought XL weight 188, length was perfect! Would definitely get more in other colors.

I didn't even bother trying these pants on. The chemical smell when I opened the bag was to overpowering for me. I'm not sure what the chemical smell was, but I cannot have that in my house or my life. I sent it back.
Ordered my usual size and they were like three sizes smaller than what they should have been. The quality was there but The sizing was way off.
I’m 5’1” and the pants are 2 inches too long. Good if wearing heals but I don’t wear heals.
Just what I wanted, great quality!  Im short and it fits just right with my shoes, it’s really nice and soft and very similar to yoga pants so it keeps me together :)

评论概述: Who knew this is what was missing in my life?
评论详情: These are so warm, comfortable and flattering. I live in CO and for once I might not hate the winter. After not wanting to take them off for two days, I ordered another pair.

评论概述: Purchased 3 and all of them are falling apart within a month or two
评论详情: Purchased 3 pairs of these pants. One pair was splitting at the seam on the right side hip area. The other two were fine at first but after wearing them maybe 5 times each the same seam is splitting. 3 for 3.... Don't waste your money. Their overpriced to begin with. I thought maybe they would be warmer and better quality but sadly no. Order from temu you'll get the same result for less money.
Great cozy pants for outdoors! I love them they look better than the athleta I tried on today. And a quarter the price.!

At first glance I thought these would be too short (I’m 5’8) but once I put them on I realized they are just perfect. I bought XL and they stretch a lot and dril can’t see my underwear through it. They are warmer than regular leggings but not for extreme weather. I bought these for work and I think I’ll get another for working out/walking.
This pant is really warm but in true BALEAF fashion they are well made and wash well. I highly recommend.
They’ll keep me warm, without being bulky like sweats!  My regular, dress/everyday pant size is large. I went with 2X for these, because of the import, & the fit was just right.

评论概述: Plus sized and big thighs approved
评论详情: As a big curvy lady I have never been able to find fleece lined leggings that would work for me until now. It’s a thinner fleece but it gives enough stretch that it is easy to pull over my thick thighs and extremely comfortable. It’s warm but not so warm that you start sweating once you’re inside. Very flattering fit and no camel toe or weird fit around the hips. Will be buying more of these.

I love the soft material though it'll definitely get rougher if not properly cared for. I would also say use this as an under layer for the cold. It provides a decent amount of warmth but not as much since the material is not that thick. For size i got a medium and it fits pretty snug. Has some stretch but not a lot.

I bought this because I teach ice-skating and my legs and feet get super cold so I was hoping to get a thicker lined fleece.  You really can’t call it fleece really not lined at all. Really a thin, thin layer not much different from regular leggings not worth it. I’m returning mine.

I ordered these with another item and they never showed up in the package. Amazon was super helpful and immediately sent out another pair and I might never take them off. They are fleece-lined and the perfect warmth as well as being soft. They are also the perfect length if you are petite.

I have two pair of the straight leg lined leggings which I love so I wanted to try this more updated style.  The pants are well made and fit great and feel really good...nice and cozy.  But they are way too short!Flairs need to cover the back of your shoe and these barely touch the foot even in bare feet.  It's unfortunate because otherwise they feel great and I would have ordered in other colors too.  Don't understand why they made them so short.  I'm a little over 5'8" so not THAT tall in this day and age.  Please make them longer!  If you are shorter or have short legs then these might work for you.  Unfortunately for me I will return them.
Followed the sizing guide and even sized up. Pants are much too small. I'm disappointed. They are a nice color, and I imagine they would be warm, if I could wear them.

Very soft, cozy and warm pants. Great length for me, most pants are short on me. I’m about 29/31 and I got large. Pretty true to size. When they have another sale,  I’ll get more colors. Medium type of flare, high waisted and secure pockets!

I guess I thought these would be warmer. I have regular lost cost leggings that are just as warm. I ordered a size up as suggested by others and the fit and length were good. Not even sure where the "flannel" is 🤷‍♀️

The quality is great, fits true to size. I ordered a M and could have easily sized down to a small for a a more snug fit (for reference I’m 5’3” and a size 4 in jeans). Plenty of pockets too! Wore with sneakers and the length is perfect. Kept me warm walking around NYC, definitely recommend!

I really like these pants I ordered a large in black. I’m a solid size 10  these are compression tight and somewhat small in the waist. They are warm enough for 32 degree mountain walking. They are right on for length. I’m 5’7” so we’ll see after delicate wash hang dry.

评论概述: Xoxoxo - will buy again.  Normally medium and ordered a large.
评论详情: Great fit.  Warm enough for mid/high 40s.  Not very thick. Thankful for boot cut.  Truly one of my most satisfying clothing purchases on Amazon. I ordered up a size and that was the right decision.

评论概述: Sized for a ten year old.
评论详情: Ridiculously small

These pants have a nice thin fleece lining, NOT that sherpa fur type, but a soft fleece. I ordered the size according to the size chart - xl . Too tight. I have a 35” waist and 42” hip. According to the chart that states xl fits to a 46” hip, I should have had a little slack in the pant but it was skin tight. I plan to ordered an xxl because these pants are SO well made.

These are the most comfortable and flattering leggings EVER. Cute drawstring, discreet pockets, and perfectly high waist. My only complaint is that they might be about half an inch too short - but I have long legs and like my flares to fit long.
Pants look nice and warm, but the sizing is wrong. Ordered 3XL and needed to return bcz they were kind of 2 size smaller.
This is thicker so a little warmer, but not confining at all. They fit me perfectly and have several useful pockets. Blue color is nice as well.
Recommend these for warmth and looks wore them all day running in and out shopping. Comfortable, looked good and kept me warm.

评论概述: They need to make them in different lengths
评论详情: I'm 5'7 1/2" and these are WAY TOO SHORT, hit above the ankle and l9oked extremely ridiculous. I don't understand why clothing manufacturers think everyone is same height and all legs are same length. If you are iver 5'5" 9r maybe 5'6" don't waste your time..One length DOES NOT FIT ALL!  Other than the length the pant itself is just okay, I don't feel they'd actually be that m7ch warmer than unlined pants b7t probably good enough for a semi-chilly day bit definetly not very cold, they won't keep kegs warm! Back they go to Amazon!

I have 2 other pairs of pants by same company. These aren’t nearly as warm as the other 2. The fabric is really soft. Glad I got them in a size larger than they suggested, they suggested M and I got L and they are still fairly tight. They are flattering though
Pants looked nice, but made for a tall thin person. I had ordered an xl, I normally wear a 12-14.  They were way too small!  I had to return them 😔
These are warm and a great fit.
I did not like the thickness for the pants, wish they had of been thicker.
They are thinner and shorter than I expected them to be. Unfortunately, I ripped them the very first day I wore them to work.
Really great quality, very warm and comfortable. I would go up one size.

The fleece lining is not super thick but it does the trick! Wore these in 32 degree weather and I felt warm enough. They fit and feel like regular yoga pants, and the the waist tie helps with adjusting the size just right. The length was perfect for me, too. I am 5'2" so this style pant usually drags but this fell right above my heel. Oh and extra points for the pockets... all the pockets you need!
these are put together horribly!  Seams at the waist line weren't sewn at all.  Found two small holes to each side first time wearing them.
They fit really well and don’t slide down.  They have fleece lining for the cold. Just bought a second pair.
I ordered a large and these pants are way too short
Very comfortable, just a little long for me, I'm a petite size.

评论概述: These are so nice and fit right-in with my style.
评论详情: I really appreciate the fleece lining. Where I live gets very cold at night and these pants keep me nice and warm.
They are not real thick for winter but thick for cold fall fit perfect  want more !
Nice quality and a good weight for chilly days.

Maybe I am too fat, but a large ripped at the waist leaving two large holes on the waist band in the back, the moment I out them on. I wear a large and I do have a larger buttocks. So perhaps they aren’t for me.maybe for someone with less glutes they will have good success with these pants.
They fit well and are very comfortable!  Love them!

So far all of the athletic clothing I’ve purchased from this brand has been on point, especially for the price. These were no exception. The fleece is thin, but still warm, and they are flattering. They are a little too high wasted for my body type so I fold them over to compensate. No issues so far after washing.
